eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A CHILD ABDUCTION EMERGENCY FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: North Carolina; AT 01:12 PM ON NOV 02, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 02:12 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
THIS IS A NORTH CAROLINA AMBER ALERT FOR A CHILD ABDUCTION

Mitchell County Sheriffs Office is searching for Neveah H Patton. Neveah H Patton is a 15 year old  white female, approximately 5 feet, 9 inches tall, weighing 140 pounds. Neveah has strawberry blonde hair, and brown eyes, It is unknown what Neveah was last seen wearing.

There is no known abductor information at this time. 

There is no known vehicle information at this time. 

If you have any information regarding this abduction, contact Mitchell County Sheriffs Office at 828-688-9110 or call 9 1 1.

THIS IS A NORTH CAROLINA AMBER ALERT FOR A CHILD ABDUCTION
